data.actual_result: You are sent back up to messages you have seen before (usually you don't notice it while scrolling)
data.expected_result: You should keep scrolling to past messages
data.short_description: Scrolling down in the Search function on a Discord server fast enough makes you go back up to previous messages.
data.steps_to_repro: - Click the magnifying glass in a discord server - Search for something that has a lot of results - Observe that you are seeing some of the same messages as before. (May have to do it several times, and make sure you're not scrolling too fast)
